resources.string: And you still have quite a bit to go this year:
And you\'re ready to make a clean start of the year:

plurals.name: echo_queue_episodes
plurals.item: from %1$d episode. That\'s about %2$f hours each day until 2024 starts. You can start the year clean if you skip a few episodes.
from %1$d episodes. That\'s about %2$f hours each day until 2024 starts. You can start the year clean if you skip a few episodes.

resources.string: We\'ve run some analysis on when episodes are released, and when you last listened to them. Our conclusion?
On average, you last listened to an episode %1$s after it was released.
We\'ve also been wondering: do you listen to the podcasts that you subscribe to?
Looking at the numbers, we think you\'re a hoarder
Numbers don\'t lie, they say. And with only %1$d of your %2$d active subscriptions having been played, we\'re probably right.
You\'ve played episodes from %1$d of your %2$d active subscriptions. We bet you keep your desk clean, too!
Whether you\'re moved over from another app, or started your podcast adventure with us: we\'re glad to have you!
Now, let\'s take a look at your favorite podcastsâ€¦
